title: Toxicity  on OCE Server
body: My main account is on  NA. It's where I started playing League before OCE existed. I'm in a Gold V team, not that Rank  is important. Just wanting to show that I'm not just new to League. I'm trying to level an account up on OCE because there is less lag. (I'm currently level 18). But it's hard when the people I meet on here, most games, are the most toxic players I've ever come across in my 3 years of being on League. I'm getting to the point where I'm not enjoying playing LoL. At all. As a girl I loved the fact that I was/am considered EQUAL by most people. But now, it's a becoming a place where I'm bullied and harassed by people in my OWN COUNTRY and it's getting worse. {{item:3070}}{{item:3070}} I just do not understand it. At least on NA when people are salty they insult your GAMING and the decisions you make. Over here on OCE they insult you as a person. Every game is becoming less enjoyable.  Reporting people after most games because they're just so horribly toxic. Yes, I mute them also. I want to play here on OCE. A fair amount of people I meet are fun, kind, and we have a great time. {{summoner:31}}  But OCE, through the people I meet on other games and even the friends I occasionally make on here, is getting the reputation for being the MOST TOXIC region of League of Legends. I don't understand why this is. I think something needs to change.

 Hey C0ntract,

I'm Mogey Bear and I'm here to take a look at your concerns. Rest easy knowing that we hear this feedback, and we intend to offer great features for all regions. We are already doing initiatives to tackle toxicity on OCE, but we are also going to be implementing a feature called an Instant Feedback that will let players know action has been taken against a report. Additionally, once the Tribunal is ready for launch, we want to offer it to regions that did not have it before.

Please help us keep the community fair and fun and submit reports after a game! Help us continue to combat the bullying! We prefer the post-game reporting tool as it helps us prioritize whose accounts we look at. Thank you, and best wishes in the Fields of Justice!
Lighting your path,

Mogey Bear
Player Behavior and Game
Herald of the Judicator
